text: I consider healthc care a right a right

affirmatively to that I think um we need
to make sure that every American is
insured and it's not just a moral

part of what we're seeing with the

one that many Americans may not latch on

for moral reasons and others and within
that uh we need to take out the for
profit
piece of it my sense though of what will
